name: 室內樂研究（一）
description:
1.認識及欣賞各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品。
2.培養及分辨各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品風格的能力。
goals: 認識及欣賞各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品。
培養及分辨各個時期、不同作曲家之室內樂作品風格的能力。
syllabus:
Class Schedule
--------------

Week 1  9/12   Introduction; Definition.

Week 2  9/19   Chamber Music in Baroque; Trio Sonata—Corelli, etc.

Week 3  9/26   The Classical Era—String Quartet and Haydn

Week 4  10/3   String Quartets of Haydn and Mozart

Week 5  10/10   National Holiday

Week 6  10/17  **Quiz 1!**

Week 7  10/24  Piano Trios of Haydn and Mozart

Week 8  10/31  Piano Quartet and Quintet – Mozart, Chamber Music with Winds

Week 9  11/7   Piano Trios of Beethoven

Week 10 11/14  **Midterm!**

Week 11  11/21  String Quartets of Beethoven

Week 12  11/28  String Quartets of Beethoven

Week 13  12/5   **Quiz 2!**

Week 14  12/12  Schubert

Week 15  12/19 Schubert

Week 16  12/26  Mendelssohn

Week 17  1/2     Schumann

Week 18  1/9    **Final Exam! Good Luck!!**

**Grading Policy:**

**Quiz 10% each**

**Midterm 25%**

**Final 25%**

**Presentation 10% each**

**Assignments 5%**

**Class participation 5%**
